titleStmt.title: A summary of material heads which may be enlarged and improved into a compleat answer to Dr. Burnet's Theory of the earth digested into an essay by a pensioner of the Charter-House.
titleStmt.author: Lovell, Archibald.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. and are to be sold by the book-sellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
